title: Smart Data Models - WasteObserved.
description: This entity models a single collection of Waste.
license: *** this is my own make - which open source license would you propose?

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be WasteObserved

location.description: Geoproperty. Location of the waste. Mandatory if address is not used. Geoproperty. Geojson reference to the item. It can be Point, LineString, Polygon, MultiPoint, MultiLineString or MultiPolygoProperty.

address.description: Geoproperty. The mailing address. Mandatory if location is not used.  Model:'https://schema.org/address

dateObserved.description: Property. Time of the wastecollection in ISO8601 UTCformat.

weight.description: Property. The net weight of the collected waste. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes ). For instance, 'KGM' represents kilogram. Units: 'KGM'.

grossWeight.description: Property. The gross weight of the collected waste. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes ). For instance, 'KGM' represents kilogram. Units: 'KGM'.

tareWeight.description: Property. The tare weight of the collected waste. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes ). For instance, 'KGM' represents kilogram. Units: 'KGM'.

refGarbageTruck.description: Property. A reference to an Vehicle Smart model referencint the vehicle used during garbage collection. ***Can I define this as either 1) an id (string) of an external system, or 2) a proper reference to anothher NGSI entity (e.g. refVehicle:Truck123 ???

refWeighingDevice.description: Relationship. A reference to the device used to measure the waste weight.

refServiceOrderId.description: Relationship. A reference to an external system containing workorders. This might contain data about a client requesting the garbage collection, or a workorder for wastecollection, or any other relavant referece.

image.description: Property. An URL to an image or images of the observed Waste.
